mapper.select: select r.id as rid, r.role_name as rname, r.create_time as rct, r.creator_id as rcid, r.update_time as ruct, r.updator_id as ruid, r.delete_flg as rdel, p.id as pid, p.permission_name as pname, p.front_route as proute from oa.user as u left join oa.sys_user_role as ur on u.id = ur.user_id left join oa.sys_role as r on ur.role_id = r.id left join oa.sys_role_permission as rp on rp.role_id = r.id left join oa.sys_permission as p on rp.permission_id = p.id where (rp.delete_flg = 0 or rp.delete_flg IS NULL) and (ur.delete_flg = 0 or ur.delete_flg IS NULL) and u.delete_flg = 0 and r.delete_flg = 0 and u.id = #{uid};
